entry.title: Flood Watch issued June 08 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Scattered thunderstorms will continue to develop and form across the area this afternoon, continuing into late tonight. These storms are forming in a very moist airmass and moving slowly, resulting in locally very heavy rainfall. Given the saturated soils from recent rainfall, any precipitation will run off quickly resulting in high potential for flash flooding near any thunderstorms.
